channel.title: iDigital

item.title: Tech leaders congratulate Trump on winning 2024 election, pledge to work together on innovation

item.description: Nous Chat gives users access to its large language model (LLM) Hermes 3-70B, a fine-tuned variant of Meta's Llama 3.1.

item.title: DraftKings cuts full-year outlook, citing unfavorable sports-betting outcomes
